column5: I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's important to talk to someone who can help. You might want to consider reaching out to a mental health professional or a trusted person in your life. Remember#Comma you don't have to go through this alone.

I understand that depression can be incredibly challenging. It's okay to feel this way#Comma but please consider seeking support. Talking to a professional or someone you trust can make a big difference.

If you're in immediate need of help#Comma please consider calling a depression helpline or crisis hotline. Your well-being is important. Here's a helpline you can call: [Insert helpline number]. Don't hesitate to reach out.
